TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Danny_Arnold, title = Danny_Arnold, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Danny_Arnold} }

S.FORM: == Danny Arnold == kawas tay 1925, ryax sa tay 23 nqu tay 1, Danny Arnold, squliq na Bunge'. (wal mhuqil sa kawas tay 1995) sraral qyanux nya Danny Arnold htgan ryax nya ga New York City, taring mtzyaw la, trang 'bagan lga mtzyaw hmyapas. the sazing cinbwanan mciriq, mhetay beh United States Marine Corps qasa. suruw lga musa maki Hollywood la. Arnold sazing kekong nha ru maki sazing laqi nya. 1955 kawas hiya te qutux kekong Ray, Gilbert na kneril laqi kekong. te sazing tmasoq qnxan. Arnold te sazing bes nya , trang hiya praw 作家 makiTennessee, Ernie . hiya ga pisbay squilq ru myuzing squilq mhtuw maki telibi. Arnold ru te sazing bes nya,maki 1961 kawas kekong,maki sazing laqi uzi David ru Dannel. 1995 kawas 8 byacing 15 ryax,maki ngasal wal mhuilq(70 kawas) bincyogun nya cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of actors

== Danny Arnold == kawas tay 1925, ryax sa tay 23 nqo tay 1, Danny Arnold, sqoliq na Bonge'. (wal mhoqil sa kawas tay 1995) sraral qyanox nya Danny Arnold htgan ryax nya ga New York City, taring mtzyaw la, trang 'bagan lga mtzyaw hmyapas. the sazing cinbwanan mciriq, mhetay beh United States Marine Corps qasa. sorow lga mosa maki Hollywood la. Arnold sazing kekong nha ro maki sazing laqi nya. 1955 kawas hiya te qotox kekong Ray, Gilbert na kneril laqi kekong. te sazing tmasoq qnxan. Arnold te sazing bes nya , trang hiya praw 作家 makiTennessee, Ernie . hiya ga pisbay sqoilq ro myozing sqoilq mhtow maki telibi. Arnold ro te sazing bes nya,maki 1961 kawas kekong,maki sazing laqi ozi David ro Dannel. 1995 kawas 8 byacing 15 ryax,maki ngasal wal mhoilq(70 kawas) bincyogon nya cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of actors
